title: 🛠️ 0.0.1 Update Info
description:
Hello, PLAYERS! 👋
Welcome to PLAY3 — your friendly, mission-powered gateway to Web3.

We are getting ready for our 𝓸𝓹𝓮𝓷 𝓫𝓮𝓽𝓪!

🚧 Maintenance Notice

📅 2025-07-09 07:00 (UTC) ~ 2025-07-10 06:59 (UTC)

🎯 PLAY3 Open Beta begins 2025-07-10 07:00 (UTC)

Four key events awaits, including 🎟️PLAY3 Airdrop.
Get ready right away with us for the opening!

Let’s PLAY3! 👾
See you in the square!

title: 📢 PLAY3 Open Beta is Live!
description:
Hello, PLAYERS! 👋
Welcome to PLAY3 — your friendly, mission-powered gateway to Web3.

<< How to enjoy PLAY3 >>

Not sure what to do first?

1️⃣ Follow the Welcome Guide

  • Tap 'Welcome John' for a quick walkthrough.

2️⃣ Complete Event Missions and grab rewards!

  • Earn Copper and Airdrop Raffle Tickets by doing missions.
  • Spend your Copper in the Shop for some fun goodies.

<< ✨ Beta Open Event Begins >>

🪂 ⛏️🎟️ Start “Raffle Ticket” Mining at Open Beta

  • The hunt is ON — and it all starts with Raffle Tickets.
  • Just by holding tickets, you’ll get guaranteed rewards.

👉 For full details, check [✨ Beta Open Event Begins] in Notice(Announcement) > Event.

🎮 Supervillain Wanted Onboarding Event

  • Supervillain Wanted is the ultimate office isekai RPG.
  • Find CEO Yuna in the main square and earn special rewards!

🏅 Main Collab Reward: VPoints

  • VPoints can be used like cash in the Supervillain Labs Web Shop.
  • Get 10–15% back in VPoints whenever you buy in the web shop or in the SVL game store!
  • Complete SVL Event Missions to stack up more VPoints.

👉 For full details, check [✨ Beta Open Event Begins] in Notice(Announcement) > Event.

Let’s PLAY3! 👾
See you in the square!

title: 📢 Pre-Registration Reward
description:
Hello, PLAYERS! 👋
Welcome to PLAY3 — your friendly, mission-powered gateway to Web3.

Thanks a ton to everyone who pre-registered and joined our Telegram quest.
You’re awesome — now grab what’s yours! 👇

🔹 [Ended] Pre-Registration Event

Pre-registered? Claim your rewards:

  • 1 Special NFT Costume Set (EVENT Grade)
  • 10,000 Copper
  • Raffle Tickets

📥 How to claim:

📬 Head to your Inbox on PLAY3; your rewards are ready to claim!
★ Sign up with the same email you used to pre-register.

🔹 [Ended] Pre-Registration Telegram Quest Event

Check our Telegram for more reward details!

  • PLAY3 Official Telegram

✨ P.S. Stardust = future perks 😉
Hold onto it!

🏃‍♂️ More Rewards Are Waiting!

Don’t miss our Grand Open Events.
Even more rewards are ready to grab!

👉 Check the [✨ Beta Open Event Begins] post for all the details!
* Announcement > Event > [✨ Beta Open Event Begins]

Let’s PLAY3! 👾
See you in the square!
